content.question: Paik’s artistic innovation in works such as Electronic Superhighway proved influential on which of the following artists?

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
